sentences.sContent: This is why many viruses, such as measles, make us ill only once.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is why many viruses, such as measles, make us ill only once.
sentences.sCn: 这就是为什么许多病毒，如麻疹，只会使我们生病一次。

sentences.sContent: Imagine if we have an outbreak of measles and the information is relayed to us three months after the outbreak.
sentences.sContent_eng: Imagine if we have an outbreak of measles and the information is relayed to us three months after the outbreak.
sentences.sCn: 想像一下如果我们已经爆发了麻疹，而消息是在爆发后的三个月后才传到我们这里。

words.tran: 患麻疹的；极少的；低贱的

trans.tranOther: an infectious illness in which you have a fever and small red spots on your face and body. People often have measles when they are children.
